mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, username, password, website, create_time, last_update, expiry_time) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiry_time = #{expiryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, username, password, website, create_time, last_update, expiry_time from admin
